title: NOS - Personal Development Plan
description: Develop an SAPUI5 BTP application to be used in SuccessFactors for employees to check the progress and add suggestions to their yearly development plans, additionally, a manager view, for managers to create and edit their team members' plans.

title: NOS - Feedback App
description: Develop an SAPUI5 BTP application to be used in SuccessFactors for employees to request and reply to feedback requests.

title: NOS - Migrate Applications
description: Migrate 3 different applications from their ESS portal to BTP to be used in SuccessFactors, these applications were: Docs (Payslip/Income Statement), Supplementary Work Cinemas and Supplementary Work Telco.

title: Navigator - BIRT Employee File
description: Develop a BIRT report for Employee File data.

title: Bensaude - EC - Cornerstone Integrations
description: Develop custom SAP CPI Integration Flows to integrate Master Data and Organizational Data from SuccessFactors Employee Central to Cornerstone OnDemand.

title: SONAE - BIRT SF 360 Evaluation
description: Update the logic of BIRT reports related to SuccessFactors's 360 Employee Evaluation.

title: EDP - Onboarding 2.0
description: Develop two SAPUI5 BTP applications, one to be used when creating a new employee profile through Onboarding2.0 APIs, the goal was to use a custom employee ID which wasn't available through standard Onboarding2.0. One to be used to check the status of the onboarding emails sent to the new employee.

title: FNAC - BIRT Certifications
description: Develop custom BIRT reports for SuccessFactors LMS certifications.

title: NOS - Benefits App
description: Develop an SAPUI5 BTP application to be used in SuccessFactors, with the goal of accessing benefits data via a PDF generated in SAP through an Adobe Form, the employee would choose a month and year and would get their pdf for the selected data.

title: NOS - EC - SAP R/3 Integrations
description: Develop a custom SAP CPI Integration Flow to integrate Contingent data from SuccessFactors Employee Central to SAP IT2006.

title: Banco de Portugal - EC - SAP Integrations
description: Setup the initial connection between SAP and BTP with the goal of implementing standard Employee Central to SAP R/3 Master Data and Organizational data integrations, development of custom SAP CPI integration flows for specific Employee Central Data.

title: MotaEngil - Global Template
description: Development of a custom infotype, configuration tables, data population reports and time evaluation functions and operations to revamp the time evaluation structure of several countries within the ME Group.

title: MotaEngil - TiME On Site
description: Develop an SAPUI5 BTP application for SuccessFactors with the goal of analyzing, updating and manually creating absences and overtime generated by time evaluation, capable of: substitutions, altering/creating Clock-ins/Clock-outs and reclassifying absences/overtime motives, also includes a Dashboard to check and compare overtime data with past values.
